boardgame.description: Based on the popular Mage Knights system, but utilizing super hero characters from the Marvel and DC Comics Universe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game plays much like a miniatures game, but without the measure-and-move system or the constant consultation of hit charts. Rather, most of the vital statistical information is directly on the base of the characters, which can be rotated as characters take damage from hits._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Since we're talking super heroes here, each character has special abilities and powers, which give the game its 'comic' book feel. While these powers are listed on separate charts, sometimes the interaction of these powers can cause confusion. Official FAQ can be found at the Wiz Kids website._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Auction win -- may only be purchased by high bidder Ken Feezor (feezjag). Lot is for nine figures as described in auction, shipped unpackaged with cards only by request of buyer.

This is a factory sealed Marvel Heroclix Sentinel. The packaging is in mint condition. I believe it is the largest Heroclix figure produced (at least, it used to be unless they came up with a larger one that I am not aware of). Comes from a smoke-free home.
for pendragon714 Heroclix lot Dungeon Magazine Lot Dragon Magazine Lot

One of my sons used to collect these figures, but never played the game. The box they are in is just collecting dust, so I thought somebody may get some use out of them. I am not familiar with the game, so I will describe what I have. If you have any specific questions, please email. There are approximately 138 Marvel Heroclix figures. I counted them, but there could be a margin of error of 1 or 2 either way. There seemed to be just a few that were DC (Riddler, Robin, etc) but the overwhelming majority are Marvel. - Infinity Challenge poster, quick play rules, rulebook - various tokens, dice, measuring tape, etc. - paper playmat Everything comes from a smoke-free home.
Reserved for Matthew Kokaly (mtkokaly)
